prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Synth Pad, Organ, Pipe, Piano, Brass, Drums, but without Guitar.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Drums, Synth Pad, Pipe, Piano, Organ, and Brass, but no Guitar.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Piano, Synth Pad, Organ, Brass, Pipe, and Drums, but no Guitar.

Style 3:
Guitar is absent from this song, which instead includes Drums, Brass, Pipe, Synth Pad, Organ, and Piano.
